憘憘憘

憘字的基本解释

憘
xǐ
古同“喜”。

憘
xī
叹息的声音。

憘字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xī］
［《集韻》虚其切，平之，曉。］
叹息声。
[②]［xǐ］
［《集韻》許己切，上止，曉。］
喜欢；喜悦。同“喜”、“憙”。

憘字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　憘； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页402第24
【說文】憙，亦作憘。　又【字彙補】古文喜字。註詳口部九畫。

憘字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
憘字的起名意思

暂无。

Zhang
Basic explanation of words
Zhang
xǐ
Gu Tong "hi".
Zhang
xī
The sound of a sigh.
Zhang
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xī］
["Jiyun" is imaginary and cut, flat, and Xiao. ]
Sigh.
[②]［xǐ］
["Ji Yun" Xu Jiqie, top stop, Xiao. ]
Like; joy. Same as "Hi" and "Xiao".
Zhang
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　憘; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 402 24
【Speaking text】Chan, also known as 憘.　[Word Supplement] Ancient Chinese Happy Words. Note the nine paintings of the mouth in detail.

like, love, enjoy; joyful thing
